author: Star
name: AutoDocSite
install_msg:
Thank you for installing the AutoDocSite cog!

This cog automatically generates a documentation site for your bot's cogs using GitHub Pages and MkDocs. If you want to help translate, go to my [crowdin](<https://crowdin.com/project/Star-Cogs>)
If you like my work, [donate me!](<https://ko-fi.com/starcogs>)

```txt
Use `[p]autodocsite setup` for detailed setup instructions.```
description: Automatic generation of documentation using GH-Pages and MkDocs.
